Directions: In a large bowl, beat egg substitute and egg. Add the remaining ingredients; mix well. Pour into a 9-in. square baking dish coated with nonstick cooking spray. Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Serve warm.
Ingredients: 1 (8.75 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 cup shredded reduced-fat Mexican cheese blend or part-skim mozzarella cheese
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, drained
2 tablespoons butter or stick margarine, melted
